TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cold Storage Plant[COLOR_REVERT], the Argentine replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Supermarket[COLOR_REVERT], gives extra gold and health if the city has access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cows[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Pigs[COLOR_REVERT], or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sheep[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Fazenda[COLOR_REVERT], the Brazilian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Grocer[COLOR_REVERT], increases a city's wealth. It also increases the city's health and wealth with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spices[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sugar[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wine[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Bananas[COLOR_REVERT], or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coffee[COLOR_REVERT]. A [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Fazenda[COLOR_REVERT] is required to build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Supermarkets[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: The Brazilian [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Fazenda[COLOR_REVERT] is a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Grocery[COLOR_REVERT] that grants 1 free happiness, 1 trade route, and slightly increases the city's wealth.
TEXT.German: The Brazilian [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Fazenda[COLOR_REVERT] is a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Grocery[COLOR_REVERT] that grants 1 free happiness, 1 trade route, and slightly increases the city's wealth.
TEXT.Italian: The Brazilian [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Fazenda[COLOR_REVERT] is a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Grocery[COLOR_REVERT] that grants 1 free happiness, 1 trade route, and slightly increases the city's wealth.
TEXT.Spanish: The Brazilian [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Fazenda[COLOR_REVERT] is a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Grocery[COLOR_REVERT] that grants 1 free happiness, 1 trade route, and slightly increases the city's wealth.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Caravanserai[COLOR_REVERT], the Iranian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Market[COLOR_REVERT], increases a city's wealth as well as providing an extra trade route. They also increase the city's happiness with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fur[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ivory[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Silk[COLOR_REVERT], or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Whales[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Taixue[COLOR_REVERT], the Chinese replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Library[COLOR_REVERT], boosts your city's research, provides culture and allows more [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Scientists[COLOR_REVERT] than a regular[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Library[COLOR_REVERT]. They are required to build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Universities[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Catholic Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT] greatly increases a city's cultural output. It makes a city's citizens happy (if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Catholicism[COLOR_REVERT] is the state religion).
TEXT.French: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Catholic Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT] augmente nettement la production de culture d'une ville. Elle rend les citoyens de la ville heureux (si le [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Catholicism[COLOR_REVERT] est la religion d'état).
TEXT.German: Die [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Catholic Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT] erhöht den kulturellen Ausstoß einer Stadt deutlich. Ist das [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Catholicism[COLOR_REVERT] in einer Stadt Staatsreligion, steigt die Zufriedenheit der Bevölkerung.
TEXT.Italian: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Catholic Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT] aumenta notevolmente la produzione culturale della città. Inoltre, genera felicità tra i cittadini (se il [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Catholicism[COLOR_REVERT] è la religione di stato).
TEXT.Spanish: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Catholic Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT] aumenta mucho la producción cultural de la ciudad. También hace felices a los habitantes de la ciudad (si el [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Catholicism[COLOR_REVERT] es la religión oficial).

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hacienda[COLOR_REVERT], the Colombian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Grocer[COLOR_REVERT], increases a city's wealth and provides additional gold with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coffee[COLOR_REVERT]. It also increases the city's health with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spices[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sugar[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wine[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Bananas[COLOR_REVERT], or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coffee[COLOR_REVERT]. A [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hacienda[COLOR_REVERT] is required to build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Supermarkets[COLOR_REVERT].
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Obelisk[COLOR_REVERT], the Egyptian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pagan Temple[COLOR_REVERT], provides a major bonus to Culture output in your city.
TEXT.French: L'[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]obélisque égyptien[COLOR_REVERT], c'est-à-dire le [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monument[COLOR_REVERT] égyptien, confère améliore nettement la production culturelle dans votre ville.
TEXT.German: Der [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ägyptische Obelisk[COLOR_REVERT], die ägyptische Variante des [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monuments[COLOR_REVERT],gewährt einen großen Kulturbonus.
TEXT.Italian: L'[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Obelisco egizio[COLOR_REVERT], l'equivalente egizio del[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]monumento[COLOR_REVERT], fornisce un grosso bonus alla cultura nella tua città.
TEXT.Spanish: El [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Obelisco egipcio[COLOR_REVERT], que reemplaza al [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monumento[COLOR_REVERT], proporciona una importante bonificación al rendimiento cultural de vuestra ciudad.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET] Establishes permanent contact with this civilization
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET] Etablit un contact permanent avec cette civilisation
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET] Gewährleistet den ständigen Kontakt mit dieser Zivilisation
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET] Stabilisce un contatto permanente con questa civiltà.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET] Establece contacto permanente con esta civilización

TEXT.English: Establishes permanent contact with other civilizations
TEXT.French: Etablit un contact permanent avec d'autres civilisations
TEXT.German: Gewährleistet den ständigen Kontakt mit anderen Zivilisationen
TEXT.Italian: Stabilisce un contatto permanente con altre civiltà.
TEXT.Spanish: Establece contacto permanente con otras civilizaciones

TEXT.English: A [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Royal Exchange[COLOR_REVERT], the English replacement for a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bank[COLOR_REVERT], increases a city's production of wealth even more than a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bank[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bourse Royale[COLOR_REVERT], version anglaise de la [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]banque[COLOR_REVERT], augmente la production de richesse d'une ville davantage que la [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]banque[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Die englische [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Königliche Börse[COLOR_REVERT] ersetzt die [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bank[COLOR_REVERT], bewirkt jedoch einen noch größeren Anstieg des Wohlstands einer Stadt.
TEXT.Italian: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Borsa reale[COLOR_REVERT], l'equivalente inglese della [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Banca[COLOR_REVERT], incrementa la produzione di ricchezza della città ancor più della [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]banca[COLOR_REVERT] stessa.
TEXT.Spanish: El [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Royal Exchange[COLOR_REVERT], el equivalente inglés del [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Banco[COLOR_REVERT], aumenta la producción de riqueza de la ciudad aún más que este último.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stele[COLOR_REVERT], the Ethiopian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pagan Temple[COLOR_REVERT], provides its city with a small amount of culture and also allow you to employ 2 priest specialists.
TEXT.French: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stèle[COLOR_REVERT], monument éthiopien qui remplace le [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monument[COLOR_REVERT], fournit à la ville une petite quantité de culture et lui permet d'avoir 2 prêtres.
TEXT.German: Die [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stele[COLOR_REVERT] ist die äthiopische Variante des [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monuments[COLOR_REVERT] und bewirkt einen leichten Anstieg des kulturellen Werts einer Stadt und ermöglicht die Existenz von 2 Priester-Spezialisten in der jeweiligen Stadt.
TEXT.Italian: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stele[COLOR_REVERT], l'equivalente etiope del [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monumento[COLOR_REVERT], fornisce alla città un piccolo contributo in cultura e permette alla città stessa di avere fino a due sacerdoti.
TEXT.Spanish: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Estela[COLOR_REVERT], el sustituto etíope del [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monumento[COLOR_REVERT], proporciona a su ciudad una pequeña cantidad de cultura y también le permite tener 2 sacerdotes especialistas.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Salon[COLOR_REVERT], the French replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Jail[COLOR_REVERT], lowers a city's war weariness and increases a city's espionage output significantly. It also provides a cultural bonus, a happiness bonus if the city has access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coffee[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tea[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tobacco[COLOR_REVERT]. It also increases the birthrate of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great People[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: Le [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]salon[COLOR_REVERT], version française de l'[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]observatoire[COLOR_REVERT], améliore la recherche scientifique d'une ville et augmente ses chances de générer un [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]artiste illustre[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Der französische [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Salon[COLOR_REVERT] ersetzt das [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Observatorium[COLOR_REVERT]. Er beschleunigt die wissenschaftliche Forschung einer Stadt und erhöht die Wahrscheinlichkeit für die Entstehung eines [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Großen Künstlers[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: Il [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]salotto[COLOR_REVERT], l'equivalente francese dell'[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]osservatorio[COLOR_REVERT], incrementa la ricerca scientifica delle città nonché le probabilità che in città nasca un [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Grande Artista[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: El [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Salón[COLOR_REVERT], el equivalente francés del [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Observatorio[COLOR_REVERT], aumenta la investigación científica de la ciudad y las posibilidades de ésta de generar un [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gran artista[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: Unique Argentinian building which replaces the supermarket. Provides additional gold with cow, pig and sheep.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Tambo[COLOR_REVERT], the Incan replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Castle[COLOR_REVERT], increases a city's defenses against pre-gunpowder units, increases espionage amount, generates more culture than a regular [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Castle[COLOR_REVERT] and is also available sooner than a regular [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Castle[COLOR_REVERT]

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stepwell[COLOR_REVERT], the Indian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Aqueduct[COLOR_REVERT], improves a city's health. It's also available sooner than a regular [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Aqueduct[COLOR_REVERT]
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Candi[COLOR_REVERT], which replaces the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pagan Temple[COLOR_REVERT], provides the Indonesians with a small production and culture boost.
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Candi[COLOR_REVERT], which replaces the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pagan Temple[COLOR_REVERT], provides the Indonesians with +1 production as well as giving them a small culture-boost.
TEXT.German: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Candi[COLOR_REVERT], which replaces the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pagan Temple[COLOR_REVERT], provides the Indonesians with +1 production as well as giving them a small culture-boost.
TEXT.Italian: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Candi[COLOR_REVERT], which replaces the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pagan Temple[COLOR_REVERT], provides the Indonesians with +1 production as well as giving them a small culture-boost.
TEXT.Spanish: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Candi[COLOR_REVERT], which replaces the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pagan Temple[COLOR_REVERT], provides the Indonesians with +1 production as well as giving them a small culture-boost.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Art Studio[COLOR_REVERT], the Italian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forge[COLOR_REVERT], provides a big culture boost and increases production, but also adds unhealthiness in cities. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Art Studios[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Eiffel Tower[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Statue of LIberty[COLOR_REVERT] world wonders, and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ironworks[COLOR_REVERT] national wonder.

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Kaizen Plants[COLOR_REVERT], the Japanese replacements for [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Coal Plants[COLOR_REVERT], provide power for the Factory, although the pollution will hurt your city's health. It provides a free [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Engineer[COLOR_REVERT] specialist and a small production bonus.
TEXT.French: L'[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]usine de schistes[COLOR_REVERT], version japonaise de la [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]centrale thermique[COLOR_REVERT], fournit de l'énergie aux usines, mais la pollution détériore la santé de vos citoyens.
TEXT.German: Die japanischen [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Schieferwerke[COLOR_REVERT] ersetzen die [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Kohlekraftwerke[COLOR_REVERT] und versorgen Fabriken mit Energie, allerdings wirkt sich die von ihnen verursachte Luftverschmutzung negativ auf die Gesundheit der Stadtbevölkerung aus.
TEXT.Italian: Le [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]fabbriche di bitume[COLOR_REVERT], l'equivalente giapponese delle [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]centrali a carbone[COLOR_REVERT], forniscono energia alla fabbrica, anche su producono molto inquinamento e riducono la salute della città.
TEXT.Spanish: Las [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Plantas de esquisto[COLOR_REVERT], los equivalentes japoneses de las [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Centrales térmicas[COLOR_REVERT], alimentan las fábricas, aunque la contaminación perjudicará la salud de la ciudad.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Protestant Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT] greatly increases a city's cultural output. It makes a city's citizens happy (if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Protestantism[COLOR_REVERT] is the state religion).
TEXT.French: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Protestant Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT] augmente nettement la production de culture d'une ville. Elle rend les citoyens de la ville heureux (si le [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Protestantism[COLOR_REVERT] est la religion d'état).
TEXT.German: Die [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Protestant Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT] erhöht den kulturellen Ausstoß einer Stadt deutlich. Ist das [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Protestantism[COLOR_REVERT] in einer Stadt Staatsreligion, steigt die Zufriedenheit der Bevölkerung.
TEXT.Italian: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Protestant Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT] aumenta notevolmente la produzione culturale della città. Inoltre, genera felicità tra i cittadini (se il [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Protestantism[COLOR_REVERT] è la religione di stato).
TEXT.Spanish: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Protestant Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT] aumenta mucho la producción cultural de la ciudad. También hace felices a sus habitantes (si el [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Protestantism[COLOR_REVERT] es la religión oficial).

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]All Saints' Church[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Protestant Shrine[COLOR_REVERT]) produces one gold each turn for every city in the world that practises [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Protestantism[COLOR_REVERT]. It also spreads [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Protestantism[COLOR_REVERT] thoughout the world and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: Le [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]All Saints' Church[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]sanctuaire Protestant[COLOR_REVERT]) produit 1 unité d'or par tour pour chaque ville pratiquant le [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Protestantism[COLOR_REVERT]. Il répand également le [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Protestantism[COLOR_REVERT] dans le monde et augmente les chances d'apparition d'un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]prophète illustre[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]All Saints' Church[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Protestant Schrein[COLOR_REVERT]) produziert in allen Städten, die das [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Protestantism[COLOR_REVERT] praktizieren, 1 Gold/Runde. Außerdem verbreitet er das [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Protestantism[COLOR_REVERT] in aller Welt und erhöht die Chancen einer Stadt, einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Großen Propheten[COLOR_REVERT] hervorzubringen.
TEXT.Italian: Il [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]All Saints' Church[COLOR_REVERT] (il [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]santuario Protestant[COLOR_REVERT]) produce un'unità d'oro a turno per ogni città nel mondo che pratica il [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Protestantism[COLOR_REVERT]. Inoltre, diffonde nel mondo il [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Protestantism[COLOR_REVERT] e aumenta la probabilità di generare un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Grande Profeta[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: El [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]All Saints' Church[COLOR_REVERT] (el [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]santuario Protestant[COLOR_REVERT]) produce uno de oro cada turno por cada ciudad del mundo en la que se practique el [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Protestantism[COLOR_REVERT]. También propaga el [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Protestantism[COLOR_REVERT] por el globo y aumenta las posibilidades de que en su ciudad se genere un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Gran profeta[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mbwadi[COLOR_REVERT], the Congolese replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Market[COLOR_REVERT], increase a city's wealth and provides additional gold with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sheep[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Silk[COLOR_REVERT], or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cotton[COLOR_REVERT]. They also increase the city's happiness with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fur[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ivory[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Silk[COLOR_REVERT], or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Whales[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Seowon[COLOR_REVERT], the Korean replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]University[COLOR_REVERT], increases a city's research and provides culture. It's also available sooner than a regular [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]University[COLOR_REVERT] and is required to build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]CERN Research Complex[COLOR_REVERT] world wonder
TEXT.French: Le [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]sowon[COLOR_REVERT], version coréenne de l'[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]université[COLOR_REVERT], améliore la recherche davantage que les [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]universités[COLOR_REVERT] et produit de la culture.
TEXT.German: Das koreanische [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Seowon[COLOR_REVERT] ersetzt die [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Universität[COLOR_REVERT], beschleunigt aber in höherem Maße die Forschung und erhöht zudem den kulturellen Wert einer Stadt.
TEXT.Italian: Il [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]seowon[COLOR_REVERT], l'equivalente coreano dell'[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]università[COLOR_REVERT], velocizza la ricerca nelle città ancor più dell'[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]università[COLOR_REVERT] stessa e produce cultura.
TEXT.Spanish: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Seowon[COLOR_REVERT], el equivalente coreano de la [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Universidad[COLOR_REVERT], aumenta la investigación en la ciudad aún más que la [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Universidad[COLOR_REVERT] y proporciona cultura.

TEXT.English: Build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ball Court[COLOR_REVERT], the Mayan replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Amphitheatre[COLOR_REVERT], to provide cities with an extra happiness and it provides extra experience to melee and archery units.
TEXT.French: Construire le [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]terrain de jeu de balle[COLOR_REVERT], bâtiment maya qui remplace le [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Colisée[COLOR_REVERT], permet de conférer aux villes trois visages heureux au lieu d'un.
TEXT.German: Durch den Bau des [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ballplatzes[COLOR_REVERT], die Maya-Variante des [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Kolosseums[COLOR_REVERT], erhöht sich die Zufriedenheit einer Stadt auf 3 (statt 1).
TEXT.Italian: Costruisci il [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Campo da palla[COLOR_REVERT], che per i Maya sostituisce il [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Colosseo[COLOR_REVERT], per dare alle città tre risorse di felicità invece di una sola.
TEXT.Spanish: Construye el [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Campo del juego de pelota[COLOR_REVERT], el sustituto maya del [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Coliseo[COLOR_REVERT], para darles a las ciudades 3 de felicidad en vez de 1.

TEXT.English: A [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Charreada Arena[COLOR_REVERT] (the Mexican replacement for a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Amphitheatre[COLOR_REVERT]) increases a city's happiness and its happiness output from using the culture slider. It will also provide extra experience to your mounted units.
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pagan Temples[COLOR_REVERT] provide a small amount of culture.
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]monuments[COLOR_REVERT] fournissent une petite quantité de culture, et sont utiles pour agrandir vos frontières culturelles au début du jeu.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monumente[COLOR_REVERT] erhöhen den kulturellen Wert einer Stadt und ermöglichen die frühzeitige Ausdehnung der Stadtgrenzen.
TEXT.Italian: I [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]monumenti[COLOR_REVERT] forniscono una piccola quantità di cultura e servono a espandere velocemente i confini della città nelle fasi iniziali della partita.
TEXT.Spanish: Los [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monumentos[COLOR_REVERT] proporcionan una pequeña cantidad de cultura y son una buena manera de ampliar las fronteras de una ciudad en los primeros tiempos.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Noria[COLOR_REVERT], the Moorish replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Aqueduct[COLOR_REVERT], provides a production bonus, in addition to the usual health bonus.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Orthodox Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT] greatly increases a city's cultural output. It makes a city's citizens happy (if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Orthodoxy[COLOR_REVERT] is the state religion).
TEXT.French: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Orthodox Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT] augmente nettement la production de culture d'une ville. Elle rend les citoyens de la ville heureux (si le [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Orthodoxy[COLOR_REVERT] est la religion d'état).
TEXT.German: Die [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Orthodox Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT] erhöht den kulturellen Ausstoß einer Stadt deutlich. Ist das [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Orthodoxy[COLOR_REVERT] in einer Stadt Staatsreligion, steigt die Zufriedenheit der Bevölkerung.
TEXT.Italian: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Orthodox Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT] aumenta notevolmente la produzione culturale della città. Inoltre, genera felicità tra i cittadini (se il [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Orthodoxy[COLOR_REVERT] è la religione di stato).
TEXT.Spanish: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Orthodox Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT] aumenta mucho la producción cultural de la ciudad. También hace felices a sus habitantes (si el [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Orthodoxy[COLOR_REVERT] es la religión oficial).

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Glassmaker[COLOR_REVERT] ,the Phoenician replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Market[COLOR_REVERT], increases a city's wealth as well as increasing trade route yield. They also increase the city's happiness with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fur[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ivory[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Silk[COLOR_REVERT], or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Whales[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Sejmik[COLOR_REVERT], the Polish replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Courthouse[COLOR_REVERT], lower city maintenance costs, provide you with a bonus to espionage and provides a small cash and happiness bonus. The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Sejmik[COLOR_REVERT] is required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Summer Palace[COLOR_REVERT] national wonder.
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Summer Palace[COLOR_REVERT] reduces the maintenance costs in nearby cities. It increases the chances of creating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Spy[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: Le [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Palais d'été[COLOR_REVERT] réduit le coût d'entretien des villes voisines et agit comme une seconde [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cité interdite[COLOR_REVERT]. Il augmente les chances d'apparition d'un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Espion illustre[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Der [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Sommerresidenz[COLOR_REVERT] verringert die Unterhaltskosten aller nahe gelegenen Städte und entspricht einer zweiten [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Verbotenen Stadt[COLOR_REVERT]. Darüber hinaus erhöht es die Chance auf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Großer Spion[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: Il [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Palazzo d'estate[COLOR_REVERT] riduce il mantenimento delle città vicine e funge da secondo [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Palazzo Proibito[COLOR_REVERT]. Aumenta la probabilità di generare un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Grande Spia[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: El [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Palacio de Verano[COLOR_REVERT] reduce los costes de mantenimiento de todas las ciudades cercanas y funciona como una segunda [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ciudad Prohibida[COLOR_REVERT]. Además, aumenta las posibilidades de generar un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Gran espía[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ziggurat[COLOR_REVERT], the Babylonian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pagan Temple[COLOR_REVERT], provides more culture than a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pagan Temple[COLOR_REVERT] and gives a small science and culture boost.
TEXT.French: Construire la [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ziggourat[COLOR_REVERT], bâtiment sumérien qui remplace le [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]tribunal[COLOR_REVERT], nécessite moins de marteaux que ce dernier.
TEXT.German: Die [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Zikkurat[COLOR_REVERT] ist die sumerische Variante des [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Gerichtsgebäudes[COLOR_REVERT], erfordert aber weniger Produktionseinheiten.
TEXT.Italian: Per costruire la [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ziggurat[COLOR_REVERT], l'equivalente sumero del [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Palazzo di giustizia[COLOR_REVERT], ci vogliono meno scudi che per la controparte generica.
TEXT.Spanish: Construir el [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Zigurat[COLOR_REVERT], el sustituto sumerio de la [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Delegación[COLOR_REVERT], requiere menos martillos que su equivalente genérico.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Sangam[COLOR_REVERT], the Tamil replacement the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Library[COLOR_REVERT], boosts your city's research, provides an extra cultural boost and provides culture. The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Sangam[COLOR_REVERT] is required to build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Universities[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ho Trai[COLOR_REVERT], the Thai replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Library[COLOR_REVERT], boosts your city's research and provides culture. It's also cheaper, provides extra happiness and is required to build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Universities[COLOR_REVERT]

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Gompa[COLOR_REVERT] ,the Tibetan replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]University[COLOR_REVERT], increases a city's research, provides culture, provides a free [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Priest[COLOR_REVERT] specialist and a defensive bonus. It's also available sooner than a regular [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]University[COLOR_REVERT] and is required to build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]CERN Research Complex[COLOR_REVERT] world wonder.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Zoroastrian Royal Fire[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Zoroastrian Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT]) greatly increases a city's cultural output. It makes a city's citizens happy (if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Zoroastrianism[COLOR_REVERT] is the state religion).

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT] allow you to create [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT], who can spread the faith in other cities. They also provide culture and a slight boost to research.
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]monastères[COLOR_REVERT] permettent de former des [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]missionnaires[COLOR_REVERT] qui peuvent propager la foi dans les autres villes. Ils améliorent aussi la culture d'une ville et accélèrent légèrement sa recherche.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Klöster[COLOR_REVERT] ermöglichen die Ausbildung von [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Missionaren[COLOR_REVERT]. Diese verkünden in anderen Städten Ihren Glauben, steigern den kulturellen Wert und beschleunigen die Forschung.
TEXT.Italian: I [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]monasteri[COLOR_REVERT] permettono la realizzazione dei [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]missionari[COLOR_REVERT], in grado di diffondere la fede in altre città. Inoltre, forniscono cultura e un piccolo aumento di ricerca.
TEXT.Spanish: Los [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monasterios[COLOR_REVERT] permiten crear [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Misioneros[COLOR_REVERT], que pueden propagar la fe por otras ciudades. También proporcionan cultura y un cierto empuje a la investigación.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Temples[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's happiness and culture.
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]petites synagogues[COLOR_REVERT] améliorent le bonheur et la culture des villes. Elles sont notamment utiles pour agrandir vos frontières culturelles au début du jeu.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Tempel[COLOR_REVERT] steigern die Zufriedenheit und Kultur einer Stadt. Sie eignen sich hervorragend, um Ihre Zivilisation bereits in der Frühphase des Spiels zu vergrößern.
TEXT.Italian: I [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]templi[COLOR_REVERT] aumentano la felicità e la cultura della città. Sono particolarmente indicati per espandere i confini della tua civiltà durante le fasi iniziali della partita.
TEXT.Spanish: Los [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Templos[COLOR_REVERT] aumentan la felicidad y cultura de la ciudad. Son especialmente útiles para expandir las fronteras de la civilización al principio de la partida.
